017package de.learnlib.cache.sul;
018
019import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
020import javax.annotation.Nullable;
021import javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault;
022
023import net.automatalib.incremental.mealy.IncrementalMealyBuilder;
024import net.automatalib.incremental.mealy.dag.IncrementalMealyDAGBuilder;
025import net.automatalib.incremental.mealy.tree.IncrementalMealyTreeBuilder;
026import net.automatalib.ts.transout.MealyTransitionSystem;
027import net.automatalib.words.Alphabet;
028import net.automatalib.words.WordBuilder;
029import de.learnlib.api.SUL;
030import de.learnlib.cache.LearningCache.MealyLearningCache;
031import de.learnlib.cache.mealy.MealyCacheConsistencyTest;
032
033/**
034 * A cache to be used with a {@link SUL}.
035 * <p>
036 * Because on a {@link SUL}, a query is executed step-by-step, it is impossible
037 * to determine in advance whether the cached information is sufficient to answer
038 * the complete query. However, in general it is undesired to execute any actions
039 * on the underlying SUL as long as the requested information can be provided from
040 * the cache.
041 * <p>
042 * This class therefore defers any real execution to the point where the cached information
043 * is definitely insufficient; if such a point is not reached before a call to {@link #post()}
044 * is made, the underlying SUL is not queried.
045 * 
046 * @author Malte Isberner <malte.isberner@gmail.com>
047 *
048 * @param <I> input symbol type
049 * @param <O> output symbol type
050 */
051@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
052public class SULCache<I, O> implements SUL<I, O>, MealyLearningCache<I,O> {
053        
054        public static <I,O>
055        SULCache<I,O> createTreeCache(Alphabet<I> alphabet, SUL<I,O> sul) {
056                return new SULCache<>(new IncrementalMealyTreeBuilder<I,O>(alphabet), sul);
057        }
058        
059        public static <I,O>
060        SULCache<I,O> createDAGCache(Alphabet<I> alphabet, SUL<I,O> sul) {
061                return new SULCache<>(new IncrementalMealyDAGBuilder<I,O>(alphabet), sul);
062        }
063        
064        /**
065         * Implementation class; we need this to bind the {@code T} and {@code S}
066         * type parameters of the transition system returned by
067         * {@link IncrementalMealyBuilder#asTransitionSystem()}.
068         * 
069         * @author Malte Isberner <malte.isberner@gmail.com>
070         *
071         * @param <S> transition system state type
072         * @param <I> input symbol type
073         * @param <T> transition system transition type
074         * @param <O> output symbol type
075         */
076        @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
077        private static final class SULCacheImpl<S,I,T,O> {
078                private final IncrementalMealyBuilder<I, O> incMealy;
079                private final MealyTransitionSystem<S,I,T,O> mealyTs;
080                private final SUL<I,O> delegate;
081                
082                private S current;
083                private final WordBuilder<I> inputWord = new WordBuilder<>();
084                private WordBuilder<O> outputWord;
085                
086                public SULCacheImpl(IncrementalMealyBuilder<I,O> incMealy, MealyTransitionSystem<S,I,T,O> mealyTs, SUL<I,O> sul) {
087                        this.incMealy = incMealy;
088                        this.mealyTs = mealyTs;
089                        this.delegate = sul;
090                }
091                
092                public void pre() {
093                        this.current = mealyTs.getInitialState();
094                }
095                
096                @Nullable
097                public O step(@Nullable I in) {
098                        O out = null;
099                        
100                        if(current != null) {
101                                T trans = mealyTs.getTransition(current, in);
102                                
103                                if(trans != null) {
104                                        out = mealyTs.getTransitionOutput(trans);
105                                        current = mealyTs.getSuccessor(trans);
106                                        assert current != null;
107                                }
108                                else {
109                                        current = null;
110                                        outputWord = new WordBuilder<>();
111                                        delegate.pre();
112                                        for(I prevSym : inputWord) {
113                                                outputWord.append(delegate.step(prevSym));
114                                        }
115                                }
116                        }
117                        
118                        inputWord.append(in);
119                        
120                        if(current == null) {
121                                out = delegate.step(in);
122                                outputWord.add(out);
123                        }
124                        
125                        return out;
126                }
127                
128                public void post() {
129                        if(outputWord != null) {
130                                incMealy.insert(inputWord.toWord(), outputWord.toWord());
131                        }
132                        
133                        inputWord.clear();
134                        outputWord = null;
135                        current = null;
136                }
137                
138                @Nonnull
139                public MealyCacheConsistencyTest<I, O> createCacheConsistencyTest() {
140                        return new MealyCacheConsistencyTest<>(incMealy);
141                }
142        }
143        
144        private final SULCacheImpl<?,I,?,O> impl;
145
146        /**
147         * Constructor.
148         * @param alphabet the input alphabet
149         * @param sul the system under learning
150         * @deprecated since 2014-01-24. Use {@link de.learnlib.cache.Caches#createSULCache(Alphabet, SUL)}
151         */
152        @Deprecated
153        public SULCache(Alphabet<I> alphabet, SUL<I,O> sul) {
154                this(new IncrementalMealyDAGBuilder<I,O>(alphabet), sul);
155        }
156        public SULCache(IncrementalMealyBuilder<I, O> incMealy, SUL<I,O> sul) {
157                this.impl = new SULCacheImpl<>(incMealy, incMealy.asTransitionSystem(), sul);
158        }
159
160        /*
161         * (non-Javadoc)
162         * @see de.learnlib.api.SUL#pre()
163         */
164        @Override
165        public void pre() {
166                impl.pre();
167        }
168
169        /*
170         * (non-Javadoc)
171         * @see de.learnlib.api.SUL#step(java.lang.Object)
172         */
173        @Override
174        public O step(I in) {
175                return impl.step(in);
176        }
177        
178        /*
179         * (non-Javadoc)
180         * @see de.learnlib.cache.LearningCache#createCacheConsistencyTest()
181         */
182        @Override
183        public MealyCacheConsistencyTest<I, O> createCacheConsistencyTest() {
184                return impl.createCacheConsistencyTest();
185        }
186
187        /*
188         * (non-Javadoc)
189         * @see de.learnlib.api.SUL#post()
190         */
191    @Override
192    public void post() {
193        impl.post();
194    }
195
196
197}
